description: Send a message to a Hipchat room, with options to control the formatting.

from.description: Name the message will appear to be sent from. Max length is 15 characters - above this it will be truncated.

room.description: ID or name of the room.

api.description: API url if using a self-hosted hipchat server. For Hipchat API version 2 use the default URI with C(/v2) instead of C(/v1).

notify.description: If true, a notification will be triggered for users in the room.

validate_certs.description: If C(no), SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.
